name: Class DebugGraphics
text:
Graphics subclass supporting graphics debugging. Overrides most methods
 from Graphics.  DebugGraphics objects are rarely created by hand.  They
 are most frequently created automatically when a JComponent's
 debugGraphicsOptions are changed using the setDebugGraphicsOptions()
 method.
 
 NOTE: You must turn off double buffering to use DebugGraphics:
       RepaintManager repaintManager = RepaintManager.currentManager(component);
       repaintManager.setDoubleBufferingEnabled(false);

fields.description: Show buffered operations in a separate Frame.

methods.method_sig: public Graphics create()
methods.description: Overrides Graphics.create to return a DebugGraphics object.

methods.method_sig:
public Graphics create (int x,
                       int y,
                       int width,
                       int height)
methods.description: Overrides Graphics.create to return a DebugGraphics object.

methods.method_sig: public static void setFlashColor (Color flashColor)
methods.description: Sets the Color used to flash drawing operations.

methods.method_sig: public static Color flashColor()
methods.description: Returns the Color used to flash drawing operations.

methods.method_sig: public static void setFlashTime (int flashTime)
methods.description: Sets the time delay of drawing operation flashing.

methods.method_sig: public static int flashTime()
methods.description: Returns the time delay of drawing operation flashing.

methods.method_sig: public static void setFlashCount (int flashCount)
methods.description: Sets the number of times that drawing operations will flash.

methods.method_sig: public static int flashCount()
methods.description: Returns the number of times that drawing operations will flash.

methods.method_sig: public static void setLogStream (PrintStream stream)
methods.description: Sets the stream to which the DebugGraphics logs drawing operations.

methods.method_sig: public static PrintStream logStream()
methods.description: Returns the stream to which the DebugGraphics logs drawing operations.

methods.description: Sets the Font used for text drawing operations.

methods.method_sig: public Font getFont()
methods.description: Returns the Font used for text drawing operations.

methods.method_sig: public void setColor (Color aColor)
methods.description: Sets the color to be used for drawing and filling lines and shapes.

methods.method_sig: public Color getColor()
methods.description: Returns the Color used for text drawing operations.

public void setDebugOptions (int options)
methods.description:
Enables/disables diagnostic information about every graphics
 operation. The value of options indicates how this information
 should be displayed. LOG_OPTION causes a text message to be printed.
 FLASH_OPTION causes the drawing to flash several times. BUFFERED_OPTION
 creates a new Frame that shows each operation on an
 offscreen buffer. The value of options is bitwise OR'd into
 the current value. To disable debugging use NONE_OPTION.

methods.method_sig: public int getDebugOptions()
methods.description: Returns the current debugging options for this DebugGraphics.
